entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is walking in a corridor and trying to open a door.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is standing beside a table in the common room, speaking to Harry Potter.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person whose half a dozen knitted hats are left on a table in the common room.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is interacting with Dobby, who is speaking to him from beside a table in the common room.
Dobby mentions that Harry Potter's owl has been taken by Dobby, implying that Hermione is the owner of the hats on the table.
